title: Christmas Printer's Ornaments
content:
Submitted by [paul d hunt](http://web.archive.org/web/20071229230957/http:/www.typophile.com/user/7006 "View user profile.") : 7.Nov.2005 7.57am 

\*+\*+\*+\*+\*+\*+\*+\*+\*+  
Seasons Greetings!

Just in time for holiday design projects, the Lanston  
Christmas Ornaments collection has a definite nostalgic  
and elegant feel for classic Christmas and Winter  
iconography. The set contains 5 fonts, including LTC  
Christmas Ornaments and LTC Holly Leaves. Both are  
designed to allow the user to create their own two-color  
design combinations. An indispensable set for the  
Christmas season, they are perfect for custom card  
creation or any other winter holiday graphics.

The set is available at 25% off until December 1st 2005 [http://www.p22.com/lanston/products/christmas.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20071229230957/http:/www.p22.com/lanston/products/christmas.html "http://www.p22.com/lanston/products/christmas.html")

\*+\*+\*+\*+\*+\*+\*+\*+\*+\*+\*+\*+\*+\*+\*+\*+\*+\*+\*  
Yule like this

In the spirit of the holiday themed fonts, we are also  
offering the just released “Yule” set at 25% off as well.  
($29.96 until Dec 1st 2005) [http://www.p22.com/ihof/yuleset.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20071229230957/http:/www.p22.com/ihof/yuleset.html "http://www.p22.com/ihof/yuleset.html")  
(single Yule fonts are regular price)

\*+\*+\*+\*+\*+\*+\*+\*+\*+\*+\*+\*+\*+\*+\*+\*+\*+\*+\*  
You’ll love this

Our holiday classic, the P22 snowflake font. It’s Free! [http://www.p22.com/free/snow.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20071229230957/http:/www.p22.com/free/snow.html "http://www.p22.com/free/snow.html")

\*+\*+\*+\*+\*+\*+\*+\*+\*+\*+\*+\*+\*+\*+\*+\*+\*+\*+\*  
New Catalog

We also have just received our 24 page 2006 type specimen  
booklets. Free for the asking... just fill out your  
mailing information here: [http://www.p22.com/products/2006catalog.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20071229230957/http:/www.p22.com/products/2006catalog.html "http://www.p22.com/products/2006catalog.html")

\*+\*+\*+\*+\*+\*+\*+\*+\*+\*+\*+\*+\*+\*+\*+\*+\*+\*+\*

Happy Holidays.  
P22
author: paul d hunt
